Default Linux kernel: By default Linux-libre, but the Debian Project also hosts a non-free repository allowing blobs to be installed optionally.[45] Built with Linux-libre tools.[47]

Install-time desktop environment or wind: GNOME (default Workstation Edition), Spins for: KDE Plasma Workspaces, Xfce, LXDE, MATE (with Compiz), Cinnamon, Sugar on a Stick
Awesome, Enlightenment, Fluxbox, GNOME, KDE, LXDE-Meta, Openbox, XBMC and Xfce (live DVD)[49]

Default Linux kernel: Debian Linux kernel, and (unlike Debian) blobs cannot be installed[47]

Install-time desktop environment or wind: GNOME, Xfce, Mate, Enlightenment, i3, ratpoison, xmonad
Has no DE. It's a browser-only interface
KDE Plasma Workspaces, GNOME, LXDE, Xfce, Enlightenment, Openbox

Default file system: Squashfs, ext2, ext3, ext4, FAT32, reiser, xfs

Install-time desktop environment or wind: KDE Plasma Workspaces, Xfce, Fluxbox, Blackbox, twm

Default Linux kernel: Ututo XS (stable) is de-blobed with Linux-libre tools.[61] Ututo UL (development) uses Linux-libre. Ututo UL means "Ubuntu-Libre"

Install-time desktop environment or wind: Install-time desktop environment or window manager selection
